Assign Adult Major Conditions cohort

Source: R/create_demographic_lookup.R
assign_adult_major_cohort.Rd

A person is considered to be in this cohort if their age is over 18 and the recid is 01B, or their prescribing cost is £500 or over

Usage

assign_adult_major_cohort(recid, age, cost_total_net)

Arguments

recid

A vector of record IDs

age

A vector of ages

cost_total_net

A vector of total net costs

Value

A boolean vector indicating whether a given record is in the Adult Major Conditions cohort

See also

Other Demographic and Service Use Cohort functions: assign_child_major_cohort(), assign_comm_living_cohort(), assign_eol_cohort(), assign_frailty_cohort(), assign_high_cc_cohort(), assign_low_cc_cohort(), assign_maternity_cohort(), assign_medium_cc_cohort(), assign_mh_cohort(), assign_substance_cohort(), create_demographic_cohorts()
